phrases: Let us see who can get someone faster!
What will I get if I win?
I will buy you whatever game you want.
But if I win, you will buy me a new pair of basketball shoes.
I am not going to lose!
Today, I am a new man.
Let me fix that for you.
Starting today, my popularity is only going to increase.
And then you will be buying those new shoes for me.
Suddenly changing your hairstyle will not make you popular, you know.
What good will it do to start wearing red lipstick all of a sudden?
What should we do now, darling?
That goes for both of us.
Why are you walking with us anyway?
There is some stuff I have to do at Nakao's place.
Man, you ruined my perfectly styled hair after it took so long it almost made me late for school.
You are still going on about that?
Not only are you small in body, you are small in character, too.
I am going to sue you for defamation!
Hey Nakao-chi, let us go get our fortunes told!
You guys should try it, too.
Come on, give it a try!
What do you want to eat?
Hey Otani, want to go see Umibouzu's concert?
A friend of mine got two extra tickets and asked me to find people to go.
Yeah, he is totally awesome, is not he?!
Have you heard his new song?
His voice is just amazing, huh?
Why do not you two try going out?
You seem to share the same interests.
Your compatibility must be pretty high.
You both like Umibouzu, do not you?
That just happens to be the case.
A girl should not say a thing like balls-balls.
I really do not need to hear that from you!
Um... excuse me, are you ready to order?
A new item on the menu..
I want to be in love!
You should just go for Otani-kun.
Why should I have to go for that midget?
I need someone who is at least taller than me.
But Otani-Kun is pretty popular, you know.
You are pulling my leg again.
Then let us go watch the basketball team practice after school, okay?
Those girls are probably from second or third year.
They always get worked up watching Otani-kun.
Hmm... the midget is actually pretty good.
Do not go for a jump shot just to look cool when you are so short.
Why is the coach so upset?
He got it in did not he?
Think about your height before you jump, shorty.
Otani got chewed out by the coach...
So the midget had this up his sleeve, too.
What is with that ugly face?
So you are using itty-bitty flower hair clips to make yourself look cute?
I borrowed these from my older sister.
You look like a little girl, do not you?
What the hell is your problem?!
I am not going to lose to you!
Like hell I will buy you shoes!
When the time comes, you will be the one buying me tons of games!
I need to do something, otherwise...
Are there any group dates coming up?!
I am going to surprise him and find a great guy.
Well, zoos are not so bad.
I am a giraffe too, after all, are not I?
What is important is what is on the inside.
If you are this tall now, you may even crack three meters by the time you graduate.
That was funny, was not it?
People always say I am funny.
It always comes to this in the end.
So, how did it go yesterday?
Cannot you tell from the expression on my face?
That is because your standards are too high.
Do not go around saying Your standards are too high to people who do not have a boyfriend.
You asked me what kind of guys I like, and I gave you a list of qualities.
I did not seriously expect to meet a guy that has all of them, but...
Maybe my standards are too high.
As a person... as a woman...
It is no good to go on like this.
I just got it from Nakao.
It is for Umibouzu's Christmas concert.
Why do I have to spend Christmas with you?!
I could say the same thing about you!
What country are you supposed to be from?
What is wrong with the two of you going together, anyway?
Why should I have to walk around on Christmas being called All Hanshin-Kyoujin?
Maybe the Christmas atmosphere will help love flow between you two.
If an amazon like her gets swept up in any kind of flow, she will probably clog the drain.
Even if we do walk along a romantic Christmas street together,
Do not sneeze like an old man.
I think I caught a cold recently.
Are you seriously looking for a boyfriend?
Our challenge is not over yet.
Well, you have got no plans for Christmas anyway, right?
We will just go to the concert and then go straight home, before any romantic feelings develop.
Whether we take our time getting there, or take longer going home, it is not like we will fall in love.
Say, what kind of girls do you like, Otani?
Well, not the type who sneezes like an old man, at the very least.
When a girl sneezes, she should cover her mouth with her hand.
This girl looks exactly like Chiharu-chan.
Um... I am kind of in a hurry, so...
Hey, Atsushi-kun, who was that girl?
You can tell me, you know.
She used to be my girlfriend.
You mean she is your ex-girlfriend?!
Why would I lie to you about this?
I have been alive for like 15, 16 odd years, It is only normal to have dated.
That is not something to be proud of!
Hey, I heard about it from Nakao-chi.
She went out with Otani-kun for two years.
And apparently Otani-kun really liked her.
I would always thought that Otani had never dated anyone since the day he was born, like me.
Now I feel like I have been left behind.
Hey Otani, why did you break up with your ex?
Wh-Why are you asking about that?!
Because I cannot imagine why you would.
You actually managed to get a girlfriend, but then broke up with her?
I did not break up with her.
She suddenly told me that there was another guy she liked.
It was particularly depressing because the guy she liked...
We used to call him the Equestrian Ground Giant of Nishi Middle School.
I think it was probably because of my height.
B-But I am sure that was just a coincidence.
I am sure she did not pick him just for his height.
Even if it was a coincidence...
Now I am even more so.
But if I said a thing like that, you would punch me again, right Koizumi?
I see, So Otani has a past like that.
Getting dumped over something like that.
No wonder you are so concerned about height.
You have to live on, Otani!
I left my purse at school.
You guys go on ahead, okay?
So we have decide to have a party with everyone who was in the basketball club on the 25th.
I was wondering if you could spare some time on that day.
The more you look, the more she looks like Chiharu-chan.
No, it is not that she looks like Chiharu-chan.
So that is why he liked Chiharu-chan.
There is something I want to say to you.
What is with that conflicted look?
Could it be Otani... still likes that girl?
I will go to the Umibouzu concert by myself.
Something she wants to say, huh?
It could be that she wants to get back together.
If you do not go, and do not end up getting back together you might blame it on me.
Rather than finding a new girlfriend, why not get back together with your old one?
It will be a faster way to settle our challenge, too.
Ahh, but since I helped you a bit...
I will just treat you to tea.
I do not know whether to consider you a good or bad person, you know.
I am a good person, of course.
But, to see you show an expression like that.
What do you mean, And so it is?
I am going to be all alone for Christmas.
Want to hang out for a bit before the concert?
Um... if that is impossible, hanging out on Christmas Eve is okay, too.
I will be going over to my darling's place on the 24th for an overnight Christmas party.
I want to give Suzuki-kun a scarf on the 25th, but I have not finished it yet, so on the 24th...
Ahh, but if I get working on it right away, I might have time.
You do not need to worry about me.
Christmas has nothing to do with us Japanese anyway.
What does it matter if I am alone?
I was so bored, I came way too early.
Everyone else must be having fun right now.
Otani must have made up with his ex-girlfriend, too.
I have been left all alone.
Now that Otani has a girlfriend, he probably will not hang out with me anymore either.
It is winter vacation, but even if I want to hang out with everybody, I will just be in the way.
The concert's about to start, too.
What does it matter if I see Umibouzu?
What does it matter if I get excited?
It is not like there is anyone I can share that excitement with.
When it comes down to it...
That sounded like Otani's voice just now.
We are going to the Umibouzu concert, are not we?
She can wait till next time.
I did make plans with you first, right?
I may have hesitated a bit, but it is not like I would break a promise.
I do not want to owe you any favors.
Why are you calling me an idiot?
Well, let us go to a pharmacy first.
Yeah I was so into it.
The street was filled with Christmas spirit.
Even if we are All Hanshin-Kyoujin, something might happen.
Did not you ask me to give it to you?
Give it to that Haruka guy.
Next: A Guy you Like or a Guy from the Past?
A Guy You Like, or a Guy from the Past?
